items.name: Biltong and Mushroom Soup
items.description: A hearty South African-inspired soup featuring tender biltong (dried, cured meat) and earthy mushrooms, blended to create a rich and comforting starter.

items.name: Soup of the Day*
items.description: Chef's daily special soup, crafted using fresh, seasonal ingredients and served piping hot.

items.name: Greek Salad
items.description: A classic Mediterranean salad with crisp cucumbers, juicy tomatoes, red onions, Kalamata olives, and crumbled feta cheese, dressed in a zesty olive oil and herb vinaigrette.

items.name: Salmon Salad
items.description: Fresh, flaky salmon served atop a bed of mixed greens, garnished with citrus segments and a light, tangy dressing.

items.name: Biltong Salad with Fig and Blue Cheese
items.description: A gourmet salad combining traditional South African biltong with sweet figs and tangy blue cheese, creating a perfect balance of flavors.

items.name: Biltong Salad with Fig and Feta Cheese
items.description: A delightful salad featuring biltong, sweet figs, and creamy feta cheese, offering a unique blend of textures and tastes.

items.name: Medium Salad (Serves 3)
items.description: A generous sharing salad perfect for a group, packed with fresh ingredients and vibrant flavors.

items.name: Avocado (Optional)*
items.description: Creamy, ripe avocado that can be added to any dish to enhance its richness and nutritional value.

items.name: Parma Ham with Melon and Feta
items.description: A classic Italian-inspired appetizer featuring delicate Parma ham, sweet melon, and crumbled feta cheese for a refreshing start to your meal.

items.name: Beef Carpaccio with Capers and Parmesan
items.description: Thinly sliced raw beef fillet, dressed with capers, shaved Parmesan, and a drizzle of olive oil, creating a delicate and sophisticated starter.

items.name: Beetroot Carpaccio*
items.description: Thinly sliced beetroot arranged artfully, dressed with a light vinaigrette and garnished with herbs, offering a vibrant and earthy appetizer.

items.name: Mandarin and Pecan Nut Praline
items.description: A delightful combination of sweet mandarin segments and crunchy pecan nut praline, providing a perfect balance of flavors and textures.

items.name: Avocado and Shrimp with Piquant Cocktail Sauce
items.description: Creamy avocado paired with succulent shrimp, served with a zesty and tangy cocktail sauce for an exciting flavor profile.

items.name: Steak Tartare
items.description: Classic raw beef fillet prepared with capers, onions, Dijon mustard, black pepper, and olive oil, offering a bold and traditional appetizer for adventurous diners.

items.name: Duck Springroll with Berry Confit
items.description: Crispy springroll filled with tender duck meat, served with a sweet and tangy berry confit for a delightful combination of textures.

items.name: Fried Haloumi Cheese and Chorizo
items.description: Crispy fried haloumi cheese paired with spicy chorizo, creating a rich and indulgent starter with Mediterranean flair.

items.name: Snails Sizzling in Creamy Garlic Butter
items.description: Traditional escargot prepared in a rich, aromatic garlic butter sauce, served sizzling hot.

items.name: Chicken Livers with Separate Peri-Peri
items.description: Tender chicken livers cooked to perfection, served with a side of spicy peri-peri sauce for those who enjoy a bit of heat.

items.name: Winelands Camembert with Cranberry Sauce
items.description: Creamy Camembert cheese from the wine region, served with a sweet and tart cranberry sauce.

items.name: Brie Cheese Wrapped in Phyllo Pastry with Fig Preserve
items.description: Soft Brie cheese encased in crispy phyllo pastry, accompanied by sweet fig preserve for a luxurious appetizer.

items.name: Crumbed Mushrooms Stuffed with Feta and Peppadew
items.description: Crispy crumbed mushrooms filled with creamy feta and tangy peppadew peppers, offering a delightful vegetarian starter.

items.name: Smoked Snoek Wrapped in Phyllo with Maroela Reduction
items.description: Traditional South African smoked snoek fish wrapped in crispy phyllo pastry, served with a unique Maroela (Marula) fruit reduction.

items.name: Calamari Starter
items.description: Tender calamari prepared in your choice of lemon butter, garlic butter, or spicy peri-peri sauce.

items.name: Calamari Portuguesa
items.description: Calamari grilled with garlic, chilli, and olive oil in the traditional Portuguese style, offering a zesty and flavorful seafood starter.

items.name: Rump (300g)
items.description: A classic cut of beef, known for its robust flavor and tender texture, perfectly grilled to your preference.

items.name: Sirloin (300g)
items.description: A premium beef cut that offers a balance of tenderness and rich, meaty flavor, expertly prepared on the grill.

items.name: Sirloin on the Bone (500g)
items.description: A substantial sirloin steak cooked with the bone in, enhancing its natural flavors and juiciness.

items.name: Fillet (200g)
items.description: The most tender cut of beef, known for its buttery texture and mild flavor, carefully grilled to preserve its delicate nature.

items.name: Fillet (250g)
items.description: A slightly larger portion of the most tender beef cut, perfect for those with a heartier appetite.

items.name: T-Bone (700g)
items.description: A substantial steak featuring both tenderloin and strip steak, offering two distinct textures and flavors in one impressive cut.

items.name: Spare Ribs / Ladies Spare Ribs
items.description: Succulent pork spare ribs, available in a full portion or a smaller 'ladies' cut, slow-cooked to fall-off-the-bone tenderness.

items.name: Madagascar Green Peppercorn
items.description: A creamy sauce featuring aromatic green peppercorns from Madagascar, adding a sophisticated and slightly spicy complement to grilled meats.

items.name: Mushroom
items.description: A rich, earthy sauce made with a variety of mushrooms, providing a deep, umami flavor to enhance your grilled dish.

items.name: The Original Monkey Gland
items.description: A classic South African sauce with a tangy, slightly sweet flavor, featuring a unique blend of ingredients that perfectly complements grilled meats.

items.name: Red Wine, Bacon, and Mushroom
items.description: A luxurious sauce combining the depth of red wine, the smokiness of bacon, and the earthiness of mushrooms.

items.name: Blue Cheese
items.description: A bold, creamy sauce made with tangy blue cheese, offering a strong and distinctive flavor for cheese lovers.

items.name: Wholegrain Mustard and Brandy
items.description: A sophisticated sauce combining the spicy kick of wholegrain mustard with the warmth of brandy, creating a complex and rich accompaniment.

items.name: Café de Paris – Herb Butter Cheese
items.description: A classic French-style sauce featuring a blend of herbs and butter, creating a rich and aromatic complement to grilled meats.

items.name: Venison Fillet with Black Cherry and Red Wine Reduction
items.description: Tender venison fillet served with a luxurious sauce combining the sweetness of black cherries and the depth of red wine.

items.name: European Wild Boar with Wholegrain Mustard Cream Sauce
items.description: Succulent wild boar meat paired with a creamy wholegrain mustard sauce, offering a rustic and flavorful dining experience.

items.name: Gemsbok Schnitzel
items.description: Crumbed loin of gemsbok (oryx) served with a rich red wine, bacon, and mushroom sauce, showcasing a unique South African game meat.

items.name: Eland Stew
items.description: A hearty stew featuring tender eland meat, slow-cooked to perfection with a blend of herbs and spices.

items.name: Sirloin Togetherness
items.description: A well-matured sirloin served with a creamy red wine, bacon, and mushroom sauce, perfect for sharing.

items.name: Sirloin Jack Daniels
items.description: Sirloin steak prepared with a distinctive Jack Daniels whiskey-infused bacon marmalade, offering a bold and unique flavor profile.

items.name: Fillet Atlantis
items.description: Tender fillet topped with succulent crayfish and a delicate sherry sauce, creating an indulgent seafood and meat combination.

items.name: Fillet Rossini
items.description: Classic fillet topped with rich chicken liver and red wine sauce, inspired by the famous French culinary tradition.

items.name: Between the Sheets
items.description: A decadent fillet topped with shrimps, asparagus, mushrooms, and a creamy pepper and Fontina cheese sauce.

items.name: Fillet Haloumi
items.description: Fillet served with haloumi cheese and a mixed berry and red wine reduction, offering a perfect balance of flavors.

items.name: Lamb of the Day
items.description: Daily special lamb dish prepared by the chef, ask your host for today's unique preparation.

items.name: Lamb Curry
items.description: A mild and fragrant lamb curry, featuring tender meat in a well-balanced, aromatic sauce.

items.name: Oxtail
items.description: Slow-cooked oxtail braised in red wine, flavored with herbs and gremolata, offering a rich and comforting dish.

items.name: Spring Chicken
items.description: Tender spring chicken available in two classic preparations: delicate lemon butter or spicy peri-peri.

items.name: Chicken Schnitzel
items.description: Crispy crumbed chicken served with your choice of cheese or mushroom sauce, a classic comfort food.

items.name: Duck Fuji
items.description: Elegant duck dish featuring a delightful combination of lychees, cherries, and mandarin orange slices, creating a sweet and savory experience.

items.name: Potato Curry
items.description: A hearty vegetarian curry featuring tender potatoes in a rich, aromatic sauce.

items.name: Mushroom Stroganoff
items.description: A creamy vegetarian dish with exotic mushrooms simmered in coconut cream, offering a luxurious plant-based option.

items.name: Toor Palak Dahl
items.description: A nutritious and flavorful curry combining lentils, spinach, and split peas, showcasing the depth of Indian vegetarian cuisine.

items.name: Paneer Curry
items.description: A dairy-free curry featuring plant-based cheese, sundried tomatoes, and chickpeas, providing a protein-rich vegetarian meal.

items.name: Kingklip Belle Meuniere
items.description: Grilled kingklip fish served with classic lemon butter, highlighting the delicate flavor of this South African favorite.

items.name: Kingklip Pachas
items.description: Kingklip accompanied by shrimps, mushrooms, and asparagus in a creamy white wine sauce, offering a luxurious seafood experience.

items.name: Kingklip Curry Shrimp
items.description: A mild coconut cream curry featuring kingklip and shrimp, providing a gentle and flavorful seafood dish.

items.name: Norwegian Salmon
items.description: Fresh Norwegian salmon prepared to perfection, showcasing the fish's rich, buttery flavor.

items.name: Calamari
items.description: Tender calamari available in lemon butter, garlic butter, or spicy peri-peri preparations.

items.name: Calamari Portuguesa
items.description: Calamari grilled in garlic, chilli, and olive oil, prepared in the traditional Portuguese style.

items.name: Prawns
items.description: Succulent prawns served with basmati rice and a choice of lemon butter, garlic butter, or peri-peri sauce.

items.name: Seafood Combo
items.description: A customizable seafood platter – ask your host to create a combination of seafood delights tailored to your preferences.

items.name: Apple Crumble
items.description: A classic dessert featuring warm, spiced apples topped with a crispy, buttery crumble, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Amarula Ice-Cream
items.description: Creamy ice cream infused with the rich, caramel-like flavor of Amarula liqueur, a South African specialty.

items.name: Chocolate Brownie
items.description: A decadent, fudgy chocolate brownie that's crisp on the outside and delightfully gooey on the inside.

items.name: Oreo Ice-Cream
items.description: Creamy vanilla ice cream loaded with chunks of classic Oreo cookies, perfect for chocolate lovers.

items.name: Caramel Crème Brûlée
items.description: A classic French dessert with a silky smooth caramel custard and a perfectly caramelized sugar crust.

items.name: Baked Cheesecake
items.description: A rich and creamy cheesecake served with a vibrant fresh fruit coulis, offering a perfect balance of flavors.

items.name: Lemon Meringue
items.description: A tangy lemon custard topped with fluffy, toasted meringue, creating a delightful contrast of flavors and textures.

items.name: Italian Kisses
items.description: Delicate Italian-style dessert cookies, light and sweet, perfect for ending your meal on a delicate note.

items.name: Ice-Cream and Bar One Sauce
items.description: Creamy ice cream drizzled with rich Bar One chocolate sauce, a indulgent treat for chocolate enthusiasts.
